overview: From 2025-06-01 to 2025-07-01, elizaos/eliza had 15 new PRs (19 merged), 3 new issues, and 22 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Start agents files without cli
topIssues.author: visionpixel
topIssues.body:
Why is the-org package removed from resources?

Any how can i start agents without the cli in docker compose? The old way was to use the-org package and start the agents with `bun run start --character path/to/character.agent.json` as command in docker-compose.yml

topIssues.title: plugin install problems (v0 plugin: giphy)
topIssues.author: BinaryBluePeach
topIssues.body:
I'm trying to install the giphy plugin  and some others. I'm getting errors. I see them in the registry. 

So for giphy-
I have tried. npm install @elizaos/plugin-giphy@github:elizaos-plugins/plugin-giphy
 elizaos plugins add @elizaos/plugin-giphy --no-env-prompt, elizaos plugins add @elizaos/plugin-giphy
 and also add in dependcies in the package.json and charcter plugins.

 It will say it's installed when I ask for the list but then gives errors when the client starts and says failed to load,  it says - requesting npm error notarget a package version that doesn't exist. npm.

I also cloned the code for the plugin and linked to elizaos. That didn't work either. 


 Can someone please give some advice? 


 I have it  Eliza installed this way - npm install -g @elizaos/cli@beta

topIssues.title: API endpoint /api/agents/:agentId/rooms returns empty list despite agent being active in rooms
topIssues.author: standujar
topIssues.body:
**Describe the bug**

The API endpoint `/api/agents/:agentId/rooms` returns an empty list of rooms `({"success":true,"data":{"rooms":[]}})` even though the agent is actively participating in multiple rooms and responding to messages in those rooms.

**To Reproduce**

Start the agent with multiple connected services _(Discord, Telegram, etc.)_
Verify the agent is responding to messages in rooms _(e.g., Discord channels)_
Call the API endpoint **GET** `/api/agents/:agentId/rooms`
Observe that the response contains an empty rooms array despite the agent being active in rooms

**Expected behavior**

The API should return a list of all rooms where the agent is a participant. For example:
```
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "rooms": [
      {
        "id": "room-id-1",
        "name": "Room Name 1",
        "source": "discord",
        ...
      },
      ...
    ]
  }
}
```

**Additional context**

- In the agent logs, there are numerous successful room creations: `Room [UUID] created successfully`
- Agent connection to rooms is also logged: Success: `Successfully connected entity [agentId] in room [roomId]`
- When a message is received and processed in a room, the agent correctly responds
- The logs show an error: `ERROR: No room found for settings provider` which might be related
- The issue appears to be in the association between the agent and rooms in the database, or in how `getRoomsForParticipant` retrieves this information
- The function that calls this API is in `eliza/packages/cli/src/server/api/agent.ts`, which delegates to `runtime.getRoomsForParticipant(agentId)` which in turn delegates to the database adapter

topIssues.title: fallback to pnpm/npm when bun install fails (macOS compatibility issues)
topIssues.author: ceeriil
topIssues.body:
**Describe the bug**

I get this error when running elizaos cli "[2025-06-01 19:18:49] INFO: Attempting to install plugin locally...
[0.83ms] ".env"
bun add v1.0.2 (37edd5a6)
error: sqlite-vec-linux-arm64@0.1.6 failed to resolve
[2025-06-01 19:18:52] WARN: Failed to install plugin locally: Command failed with exit code 1: bun add @elizaos/plugin-openai@1.0.0-beta.26
[2025-06-01 19:18:52] INFO: Attempting to install plugin globally...
bun add v1.0.2 (37edd5a6)

 installed @elizaos/plugin-openai@1.0.0-beta.26" 

how to fix this? would prefer to use pnpm cause I'm running an older version of bun but when I delete bun. it still tries to install with bun

topPRs.title: Move message server to self DB, add specs to core
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body: This PR updates the message server to use standalone and switches the core to use specs

topPRs.title: Add plugin specifications to core
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body:
This PR adds plugin specifications to core

Everything should work as it has, and there should be no need to modify any code outside of core to engage this specification functionality.

In the future, plugins can be migrated to import the v2 specification from @elizaos/core/v2 and we will do our best to support forward compatibility with v3, v4, etc

topPRs.title: feat: refactor message server to be completely separate and standalone from agents
topPRs.author: lalalune
topPRs.body:
This PR updates the message server to use standalone and switches the core to use specs

Summary by CodeRabbit
New Features

Introduced a centralized messaging system with support for servers, channels (including group and DM), participants, and messages, enabling real-time chat and group conversations.
Added UI components for group channels, agent cards, group cards, and a group creation page.
Implemented file and media attachment support in chat and group conversations.
Enhanced sidebar and home page to display central servers and group channels.
Added offline status detection and improved connection handling.
Improvements

Refactored chat and group chat components to use centralized channels and messages.
Upgraded API client and hooks for new messaging, agent, and group management endpoints.
Improved optimistic UI updates and error handling for message sending and file uploads.
Enhanced agent and group navigation with direct message and group chat flows.
Bug Fixes

Improved error handling and logging for network and API failures.
Fixed message deduplication and sorting in chat views.
Documentation

Added detailed documentation for versioned plugin APIs and migration guides.
Tests

Added comprehensive unit and integration tests for new messaging, state conversion, provider compatibility, and search utilities.
Chores

Updated dependencies and improved internal type safety and code organization.
